headline: Molson Coors (TAP): Assessing Valuation After Q3 Earnings Miss, Sales Decline, and Outlook Cut
summary: Molson Coors Beverage (TAP) just reported third-quarter earnings, and the numbers fell short of expectations. Sales and revenue both declined year over year, while the company also booked a large goodwill impairment. See our latest analysis for Molson Coors Beverage. Molson Coors’ latest earnings disappointment and guidance cut come after a year in which the stock has struggled to gain traction, as risk sentiment has clearly faded. Despite a brief pop of nearly 2% after Q3 results, the...
